item.title: It doesnt say You have defeatd "+playername+" in fun pk?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

In that case you can just do:

if (!IsInFightCave() && !inFunPk() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && playerRights != 2 && playerRights != 3 && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 &&  System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500) {
		client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];
		youdied();
		sM("You have defeated "+playerName+".");
		}

Because you are just sending information to the person that killed the person, not the person who died.

Read full topic

item.title: It doesnt say You have defeatd "+playername+" in fun pk?
item.dc:creator: @Fight247 Fight247
item.description:
@Fight247 wrote:

Hello,

I have followed JC’s tut for fun pk,

I have this if (!IsInFightCave() && !inFunPk() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && playerRights != 2 && playerRights != 3 && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500) { client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId]; youdied(); killerz.sM("You have defeated "+playerName+"."); }

It says in wilderniss You have defeated playername.
But in fun pk it doesnt, please help me!
Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: It doesnt say You have defeatd "+playername+" in fun pk?
